rows.label: qst710201_msg0001
rows.name:
Sorry, but if you came here for fish,
you'll be sorely disappointed. There's
not a single one left round here.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0002
rows.name:
You saw it too, didn't
you? Damn Grail and his
mooks ruined everything.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0003
rows.name:
They had these brilliant,
shining wings...

rows.label: qst710201_msg0004
rows.name:
And the light they shot
off somehow ended up killing
off all the fish...

rows.label: qst710201_msg0005
rows.name: But I'm not going to give up.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0006
rows.name:
I'll fill these pails of mine with
fish, little by little. I'll get the
shoal going strong once again.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0007
rows.name:
You don't think you'd be able to
help, do you? You'd only have to
bring me the fish you catch.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0008
rows.name:
I want to collect as many kinds
of fish as possible, and that's a
bit difficult to do by myself.

rows.label: qst710201_msg0009
rows.name: I'll be glad of the help!
